name: Ysabella
wishText: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you! ~ Dr Seuss
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Bella!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: click, if you want to watch it again.
